email.title: 32BIDS – the IMC coding challenge
email.text:
![32BIDS Use your coding skills to win](https://i.imgur.com/9IZxCEB.jpg)
Hi there,
Flex those fingers and get ready for some heavy-duty brain action, IMC Trading have just announced the launch of their new coding challenge 32BIDS!
Register for 32BIDS and you’ll compete for great prizes and see where your skills rank with people from right across Europe. You’ll be faced with some complex challenges which are all set within trading scenarios – so not only do you get to put your skills to the test, but you’ll learn a thing or two about algorithm-based trading.
It’s fast, it’s complex and there are some great prizes to be won. Have you got what it takes to win the grand prize?
[Visit our website](http://url8355.careeralerts.imc.com/ls/click?upn=lmI9RGoq9WvNF-2FjfD46a5JllE1ChNslkwH9PB4IaTNv7tsNEuuaoadF2HjfS9wscleJs8cocmZAxQuZKAcwj1zOjvt-2FPKtzugoo-2Fvk0lF2CKG4KvoVjizfvgzY5hJ9BCXpqlWPKEbFgafzr8fF1nXA-3D-3DnuIJ_ezICtaugC0DgPI7RDDET06HwjtGZVkCubo0-2BX5jds-2B-2F2qUmE9CvNdrd2qEIQSGIr3pNbN1tZ9wMptwWUc-2B-2FLom2DX7q81EMOuDGBBzXTGn9vWrimtLTinzoIqK-2F7Rw-2FSr-2Fbmvqzewt0jDcheg1fRSwTNu3wvZyidejAY8HWVuSWt9j6x1JCrQlvirk-2FTD7XdgbsF-2FaTCM8ZE7Jq2PKlDHUc5owYnD3MDKbWvXx6jD0PTT4mFUXsrLGkGmELBzxcE9I0N5-2FsGqRu2VFZOZe1ybthQmpTf3dswSHo290BzdD3Pcvpb22mjTuKUkq-2BmhZLXGnItMa7EIPEc3KrqxDb8WioCxUeQ46T512WORljFc-2BlG9j-2FZEJ3qnG9xUJlkB8-2FohsQdk-2FLJ0mW7k0f6NxVYjCD6o1l5Z8mhIXNdrhUB5XCwhKEjuPCf8Vl-2BwAhZNWsA-2BjXlc6ZQeYQ5MVI7ocrYI7P8pjTuL6XFiuaSvY7xuIxHcCFBQ8m-2BRFgNKXC35zz-2BHJTYgnVDez2dY63i9oUgtfiQZFboQYHMfZqkWCMiH-2FwJyQylyDfcmRqDlt4oKl7sK-2Bz9uFA2mIXkgkN-2F-2FzgKF0sKmzAqQU-2Bqhqg4HcgsgJg-3D) and register today!
Happy coding!
**IMC Trading**
